name: legend of love
description:
This is a road racing game that allows you to engage in passionate racing on the road. In the game, we can drive various types of cars that can fly freely on the road. The ultimate gorgeous and noble sports car, combined with streamlined light and shadow effects, reproduces the charm of racing on your screen.

On this peaceful rural road, racers drove their beloved cars to engage in a small car race. This race car test is not about speed, but about your drifting skills. Can you have a better experience on this track with many bends?

Easy to operate, diverse gameplay, simple directional key control can make the racing car go straight, or you can use the directional key combined with the forward key for drifting. Come and control your car!
